manzils.text: taa seem-meem
ye aayate roushan kitaab ki hai
un ke imaan na laane par shaayad aap to apni jaan kho denge
agar hum chaahte, to un par asmaan se koyi aisi nishaani utaar te, ke jis ke saamne un ki gardane qam ho jaati
aur un ke paas rahmaan ki taraf se jo bhi nayi nasihath aayi, ye us se ru gardaani karne waale ban gaye
un logo ne jhutlaya hai, ab un ke paas jaldi se us ki qabre aa jayengi, jis ke saath wo masqara pan kar rahe hai
kya unhone zameen par nazre nahi daali? ke hum ne us mein har tarah ke nafees jode kis qadar ugaaye hai
beshak us mein yaqinan nishaani hai aur un mein ke aksar log momin nahi hai
aur tera rab yaqinan wahi ghaalib aur meherbaan hai
aur jab aap ke rab ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko awaaz di, ke tu zaalim khaum ke paas ja
khaum feraun ke paas, kya wo parhezgaari na karenge
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha, mere parvardigaar! mujhe to khauf hai ke kahi wo mujhe jhutla (na) de
aur mera sina tang ho raha hai aur meri zabaan chal nahi rahi, pas tu Haroon(alaihissalaam) ki taraf bhi (wahi) bhej
aur un ka mujh par mere ek qusoor ka (daawa) bhi hai, mujhe dar hai ke kahi wo mujhe maar na daale
janaab baari ne farmaya! hargiz aisa na hoga, tum duno hamaari nishaaniya le kar jaao, hum khud sunne waale tumhaare saath hai
tum duno feraun ke paas ja kar kaho ke bila shuba hum rabbul aalameen ke bheje hoye hai
ke tu hamaare saath bani israel ko rawaana karde
feraun ne kaha, ke kya hum ne tujhe tere bachpan ke zamaane mein apne haan nahi paala tha? aur tu ne apni umr ke bahuth se saal hum mein nahi guzaare
phir tu apna wo kaam kar gaya, jo kar gaya, aur tu na shukro mein hai
(Hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne jawaab diya ke main ne us kaam ko us waqt kiya tha jab ke main raah bhule hoye logo mein se tha
phir tum se khauf kha kar main tum mein se bhaag gaya, phir mujhe mere rab ne hukm wa ilm ata farmaya aur mujhe apne paighambaro mein se kar diya
mujh par tera kya yahi wo ehsaan hai? jise tu jata raha hai, ke tu ne bani israel ko ghulaam bana rakha hai
feraun ne kaha rabbul aalameen kya (cheez) hai
(hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne farmaya wo asmaano aur zameen aur un ke darmiyaan ki tamaam chizo ka rab hai, agar tum yaqeen rakhne waale ho
feraun ne apne irdh girdh waalo se kaha ke kya tum sun nahi rahe
(hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne farmaya, wo tumhara aur tumhare agle baap dadaao ka parvardigaar hai
feraun ne kaha (logo!) tumhara ye rasool jo tumhaari taraf bheja gaya hai, ye to yaqinan deewana hai
(hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne farmaya wahi mashriq wa maghrib ka aur un ke darmiyaan ki tamaam chizo ka rab hai, agar tum aql rakhte ho
feraun kehne laga, sun le! agar tu ne mere siva kisi aur ko maboodh banaya, to main tujhe qaidiyo mein daal donga
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha agar che main tere paas koyi khuli cheez le aao
fearun ne kaha agar tu saccho mein se hai, to ose pesh kar
aap ne (osi waqt) apni laathi daal di, jo achaanak khullam khulla (zabardast) az-daha ban gayi
aur apna haath khinch nikala, to wo bhi osi waqt har dekhne waale ko safedh chamkila nazar aane laga
feraun apne aas paas ke sardaaro se kehne laga, bhai ye to koyi bada daana jaadugar hai
ye to chahta hai ke apne jaadu ke zoor se, tumhe tumhaari sar zameen se hee nikaal de, bataao ab tum kya hukm dete ho
un sab ne kaha, aap ise aur is ke bhai ko muhullath di jiye aur tamaam shehro mein har-kaare bhej di jiye
jo aap ke paas zee ilm jaadugaro ko le aaye
phir ek muqarrar din ke waade par tamaam jaadugar jama kiye gaye
aur aam logo se bhi keh diya gaya ke tum bhi majme mein haazir ho jaoge
ta ke agar jaadugar ghaalib aa jaaye to hum unhee ki pairvi kare
jaadugar aa kar feraun se kehne lage ke agar hum jeet gaye to hamein kuch in’aan bhi milega
feraun ne kaha haan! (badi khushi se) balke aisi surath mein tum mere qaas darbaari ban jaoge
phir (hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne jaadugaro se farmaya, jo kuch tumhe daalna hai daal do
unhone apni rassiya aur laathiyaa daal di, aur kehne lage izzate feraun ki qasam hum yaqinan ghaalib hee rahenge
ab (hazrath) Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne bhi apni laathi maidaan mein daal di, jis ne osi waqt un ke jhoot moot ke kartab ko nigalna shuro kar diya
ye dekhte hee jaadugar be-eqtiyaar sajde mein gir gaye
aur unhone saaf keh diya ke, hum to Allah rabbul aalameen par imaan laaye
yaani Mosa(alaihissalaam) aur Haroon(alaihissalaam) ke rab par

feraun ne kaha ke meri ijaazath se pehle tum us par imaan le aaye? yaqinan yahi tumhara wo bada (sardaar) hai, jis ne tum sab ko jaadu sikhaya hai, so tumhe abhi abhi maloom ho jayega, qasam hai, main abhi tumhaare haath paao, ulte taur par kaat donga aur tum sab ko soli par latka donga
unhone kaha koyi haraj nahi, hum to apne rab ki taraf lautne wale hai hee
is bina par ke hum sab se pehle imaan waale bane hai, hamein ummid padti hai ke hamara rab hamari sab qataaye maaf farma dega
aur hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko wahi ki, ke raatho raath mere bandho ko nikaal le chal, tum sab picha kiye jaoge
feraun ne shahro mein harkaaro ko bhej diya
ke yaqinan ye gruh bahuth hee kam tedaath mein hai
aur us par ye hamein saqth ghazab-naak kar rahe hai
aur yaqinan hum badi jamaath hai, un se chaukanna rehne waale
bil aaqir hum ne unhe baaghaath se aur chashmo se
aur qazaano se aur acche acche muqamaath se nikaal baaher kiya
isi tarah hoa aur hum ne un (tamaam) chizo ka waaris bani israel ko bana diya
pas ferauni suraj nikalte hee, un ke ta’aqqub mein nikle
pas jab duno ne ek dosre ko dekh liye to Mosa(alaihissalaam) ke saathiyo ne kaha, hum to yaqinan pakad liye gaye
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha hargiz nahi, yaqeen maano mera rab mere saath hai, jo zaroor mujhe raah dikhayega
hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ki taraf wahi bheji ke darya par apni laathi maar, pas osi waqt darya phat gaya aur har ek hissa paani ka misl bade pahaad ke ho gaya
aur hum ne osi jagah dosro ko nazdeek la khada kar diya
aur Mosa(alaihissalaam) ko aur us ke tamaam saathiyo ko najaath de di
phir aur sab dosro ko dubo diya
yaqinan us mein badi ibrath hai, aur un mein ke aksar log imaan waale nahi
aur beshak aap ka rab bada hee ghaalib wa meherbaan hai
unhe Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ka waaqea bhi suna do
jab ke unhone apne baap aur apni khaum se farmaya ke tum kis ki ibaadath karte ho
unhone jawaab diya ke ibaadath karte hai butho ki, hum to baraabar un ke mujaawer bane baithe hai
aap ne farmaya ke jab tum unhe pukaarte ho, to kya wo sunte bhi hai
ya tumhe nafa nuqsaan bhi pahoncha sakte hai
unhone kaha ye (hum kuch nahi jaante) hum ne to apne baap dadaao ko isi tarah karte hoye paaya
aap ne farmaya, kuch qabar bhi hai, jinhe tum pooj rahe ho
tum aur tumhaare agle baap dada, wo sab mere dushman hai
bajuz sacche Allah ta’ala ke jo tamaam jahaan ka paalan haar hai
jis ne mujhe paida kiya hai aur wahi meri rehbari farmata hai
wahi hai jo mujhe khilata pilaata hai
aur jab main bimaar pad jaao to mujhe shifa ata farmata hai
aur wahi mujhe maar dalega, phir zinda kar dega
aur jis se ummid bandhi hoyi hai ke wo roze jaza mein mere gunaaho ko baqsh dega
aye mere rab! mujhe quwwate faisla ata farma aur mujhe nek logo mein mila de
aur mera zikr khair dosre logo mein bhi baaqi rakh
mujhe nemato waali jannath ke waariso mein se bana de
aur mere baap ko baqsh de, yaqinan wo gumraaho mein se tha
aur jis din ke log dobara jilaaye jaaye, mujhe ruswa na kar
jis din ke maal aur aulaad kuch kaam na ayegi
lekin fayede wala wahi hoga jo Allah ta’ala ke saamne be ayb dil le kar jaaye
aur parhezgaaro ke liye jannath bil-kul nazdeek la di jayegi aur gumraah logo ke liye jahannam zaahir kardi jayegi
aur un se pucha jayega jin ki tum puja karte rahe, wo kahaan hai
jo Allah ta’ala ke siva thein, kya wo tumhaari madad karte hai
ya koyi badhla le sakte hai
pas wo sab aur kul gumraah log jahannam mein aundhe mu daal diye jayenge
aur iblees ke tamaam ke tamaam lashkar bhi wahaan
aapas mein ladte jhagadte hoye kahenge
ke qasam Allah ki! yaqinan hum khuli ghalti par thein
jab ke tumhe rabbul aalameen ke baraabar samajh baithe thein
aur hamein to siva un badh-kaaro ke kisi aur ne gumraah nahi kiya tha
ab to hamaara koyi sifaarishi bhi nahi
aur na koyi (saccha) gham qaar dosth
agar kaash ke hamein ek martaba phir jaana milta, to hum pakke sacche momin ban jaate
ye maanjra yaqinan ek zabardast nishaani hai, un mein se aksar log imaan laane waale nahi
yaqinan aap ka parvardigaar hee ghaalib meherbaan hai
khaum nuh ne bhi nabiyo ko jhutlaya
jab ke un ke bhai Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke kya tumhe Allah ka khauf nahi
suno main tumhari taraf Allah ka amaanat-daar rasool hoon
pas tumhe Allah se darna chahiye aur meri baath maanni chahiye
main tum se us par koyi ajr nahi chahta, mera badhla to sirf rabbul aalameen ke haan hai
pas tum Allah ka khauf rakho aur meri farma-bardaari karo

un ka hisaab to mere rab ke zimme hai, agar tumhe sha’oor ho to
main imaan waalo ko dhakke dene wala1 nahi
main to saaf taur par dara dene wala hoon
unhone kaha ke aye Nuh(alaihissalaam) agar tu baaz na aya, to yaqinan tujhe sangsaar kar diya jayega
aap ne kaha aye mere parvardigaar! meri khaum ne mujhe jhutla diya
pas tu mujh mein aur un mein koyi qatayi faisla karde aur mujhe aur mere ba imaan saathiyo ko najaath de
chuna che hum ne ose aur us ke saathiyo ko bhari hoyi kashti mein (sawaar kara kar) najaath de di

aadiyo ne bhi rasulo ko jhutlaya
jab ke un se un ke bhai hoodh ne kaha ke kya tum darte nahi
main tumhara amaanat daar-paighambar hoon
pas Allah se daro aur mera kaha maano
main us par tum se koyi ujrath talab nahi karta, mera sawaab to tamaam jahaan ke parvardigaar ke paas hee hai
kya tum ek ek teele par ba taur khel tamaasha yaad gaar (imaarath) bana rahe ho
aur badi san-ath waale (mazbooth mahel tameer) kar rahe ho, goya ke tum hamesha yahi rahoge
aur jab kisi par haath daalte ho, to saqti aur zulm se pakadte ho
Allah se daro aur meri pairvi karo
us se daro jis ne un chizo se tumhaari imdaath ki, jinhe tum jaante ho
us ne tumhaari madad ki maal se aur aulaad se
baghaath se aur chashmo se
mujhe to tumhaari nisbath bade din ke azaab ka andesha hai
unhone kaha ke aap waaz kahe, ya waaz kehne waalo mein na ho, hum par yeksa hai
ye to bas puraane logo ki aadath hai
aur hum har giz azaab nahi diye jayenge
chu ke aadiyo ne hazrath Hood ko jhutlaya, is liye hum ne unhe tabaah kar diya, yaqinan us mein nishaani hai aur un mein se aksar be imaan thein
beshak aap ka rab wahi hai ghaalib meherbaan

un ke bhai Saaleh ne un se farmaya ke kya tum Allah se nahi darte
main tumhaari taraf Allah ka amaanat-daar paighambar hoon
to tum Allah se daro aur mera kaha karo
main us par tum se koyi ujrath nahi maangta, meri ujrath to bas parvardigaare aalam par hee hai
kya un chizo mein jo yahaa hai, tum aman ke saath chohd diye jaoge
yaani un baagho aur un chashmo
aur un kheto aur un khajuro ke baagho mein jin ke shagufe narm wa naazuk hai
aur tum pahaado ko taraash taraash kar pur takalluf makanaath bana rahe ho
pas Allah se daro aur meri ita’ath karo
be-baak hadh se guzar jaane walo ki ita’ath se baaz aa jaao
jo mulk mein fasaadh pehla rahe hai aur islaah nahi karte
wo bole ke bas tu un mein se hai, jin par jaadu kar diya gaya hai
to, tu hum jaisa hee insaan hai, agar tu saccho se hai, to koyi maujeza le aa
aap ne farmaya ye hai oontni paani pine ki, ek baari is ki aur ek muqarrara din ki baari paani pine ki tumhaari
(qabardaar!) ise buraayi se haath na lagaana, warna ek bhaari din ka azaab tumhaari girift kar lega
phir bhi unhone us ki kuche kaat daali, bas wo pashemaan ho gaye
aur azaab ne unhe aa dabocha, beshak us mein ibrath hai aur un mein se aksar log momin na thein
aur beshak aap ka rab, bada zabardasth aur meherbaan hai
khaum looth ne bhi nabiyo ko jhutlaya
un se un ke bhai Looth(alaihissalaam) ne kaha, kya tum Allah ka khauf nahi rakhte
main tumhari taraf amanatdaar rasool hoon
pas tum Allah ta’ala se daro aur meri ita’ath karo
main tum se us par koyi badhla nahi maangta, mera ajr to sirf Allah ta’ala par hai, jo tamaam jahaan ka rab hai
kya tum jahaan waalo mein se mardo ke saath shewat-raani karte ho
aur tumhaari jin aurto ko Allah ta’ala ne tumhara joda banaya hai, un ko chohd dete ho balke tum ho hee hadh se guzar jaane waale
unhone jawaab diya ke aye Looth!(alaihissalaam) agar tu baaz na aaya, to yaqinan nikaal diya jayega
aap ne farmaya, main tumhaare kaam se saqth na khush hoon
mere parvardigaar! mujhe aur mere gharaane ko us (wabaal) se bacha le, jo ye karte hai
pas hum ne ose aur us ke mutaalleqeen ko, sab ko bacha liya
bajuz ek budhiya ke, ke wo piche reh jaane waalo mein ho gayi
phir hum ne baaqi aur sab ko halaak kar diya
aur hum ne un par ek qaas qism ka meh barsaaya, pas bahuth hee bura meh tha, jo daraaye gaye hoye logo par barsa
ye maanjra bhi saraa-sar ibrath hai, un mein se bhi aksar musalmaan na thein
beshak tera parvardigaar wahi hai, ghalbe wala, meherbaani wala
ayka waalo ne bhi rasulo ko jhutlaya
jab ke un se Shuaib (alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke kya tumhe dar khauf nahi
main tumhari taraf amaanatdaar rasool hoon
Allah ka khauf khaao aur meri farma-bardaari karo
main us par tum se koyi ujrath nahi chaahta, mera ajr tamaam jahaano ke paalne waale ke paas hai
naap pura bhara karo, kam dene walo mein shamuliyath na karo
aur sidhi sahih taraazu se tola karo
logo ko un ki cheeze kami se na do, be baaki ke saath zameen mein fasaadh machaate na phiro
us Allah ka khauf rakho, jis ne khud tumhe aur agli maqlooq ko paida kiya hai
unhone kaha, tu, to un mein se hai jin par jaadu kar diya jaata hai
aur tu to hum hee jaisa ek insaan hai aur hum to tujhe jhoot bolne waalo mein se hee samajhte hai
agar tu sacche logo mein se hai to hum par asmaan ke tukde gira de
kaha ke mera rab qoob jaanne wala hai, jo kuch tum kar rahe ho
chu ke unhone ose jhutlaya to, unhe sayebaan waale din ke azaab ne pakad liya, wo bade bhaari din ka azaab tha
yaqinan us mein badi nishaani hai aur un mein aksar musalmaan na thein
aur yaqinan tera parvardigaar albatta wahi hai, ghalbe wala, meherbaani wala
aur beshak wa shuba, ye (Qur’aan) rabbul aalameen ka nazil farmaya hoa hai
ise amaanatdaar farishta le kar aya hai
aap ke dil par utra hai, ke aap agaah kar dene waalo mein se ho jaaye
saaf arabi zabaan mein hai
agle nabiyo ki kitaabo mein bhi is Qur’aan ka taskera hai
kya unhe ye nishaani kaafi nahi, ke haqqaniyate Qur’aan ko to, bani israel ke ulema bhi jaante hai
aur agar hum ise kisi ajami shaqs par naazil farmaate
pas wo un ke saamne us ki tilaawath karta, to ye ose baawar karne waale na hote
isi tarah hum ne gunehgaaro ke dilo mein is inkaar ko dakhil kar diya hai
wo jab tak dardnaak azaabo ko mulaaheza na karle, imaan na layenge
pas wo azaab un ko nagaha aa jayega, unhe us ka sha’oor bhi na hoga
us waqt kahenge ke, kya hamein kuch mahullath di jayegi
pas kya ye hamaare azaab ki jaldi macha rahe hai
accha ye bhi bataao ke, agar hum ne unhe kayi saal bhi fayeda uthaane diya
phir unhe wo azaab aa laga jin se ye dhamkaaye jaate thein
to jo kuch bhi ye baratte rahe, us mein se kuch bhi fayeda na pahoncha sakega
hum ne kisi basti ko halaak nahi kiya hai, magar isi haal mein, ke us ke liye daraane waale thein
nasihath ke taur par aur hum zulm karne waale nahi hai
is Qur’aan ko shaitaan nahi laaye
na wo us ke qaabil hai, na unhe us ki taaqath hai
balke wo to, sunne se bhi mehroom kar diye gaye hai
pas tu Allah ke saath kisi aur maboodh ko na pukaar, ke tu bhi saza paane walo mein se ho jaaye
apne qaribi rishte waalo ko dara de
us ke saath ferotni2se pesh aa, jo bhi imaan laane wala ho kar teri taabedari kare
agar ye log teri na farmaani kare to, tu elaan karde ke main un kaamo se bezaar hoon jo tum kar rahe ho
apna pura bharosa ghaalib meherbaan Allah par rakh
jo tujhe dekhta rehta hai, jab ke tu khada hota hai
aur sajda karne waalo ke darmiyaan tera ghumna phirna bhi
wo bada hee sunne wala aur qoob hee jaane wala hai
kya main tumhe bataao ke shaitaan kis par utarte hai
wo har ek jhute gunehgaar par utarte hai
(uchat-ti) hoyi suni sunaayi pahoncha dete hai aur un mein se aksar jhote hai
shaayaro ki pairvi wo karte hai, jo behke hoye ho
kya aap ne nahi dekha ke shaayar ek ek biya baan3 mein sar takraate phirte hai
aur wo kehte hai, jo karte nahi
sivaaye un ke jo imaan laaye aur nek amal kiye aur ba kasrath Allah ta’ala ka zikr kiya aur apni mazlumi ke baadh inteqaam liya, jinhone zulm kiya hai wo bhi abhi jaan lenge ke kis karwat ulat-te hai
Taa seeen - ye aayate hai Qur’aan ki (yani waazeh) aur roushan kitaab ki
hidaayath aur khush qabri imaan waalo ke liye
jo namaaz qaayam karte hai aur zakaath ada karte hai aur aaqirath par yaqeen rakhte hai
jo log qayaamath par imaan nahi laate, hum ne unhe un ke kartooth zinat-daar kar dikhaaye hai, pas wo bhatakte phirte hai
yahi log hai jin ke liye bura azaab hai aur aaqirath mein bhi wo saqth nuqsaan yaafta hai
beshak aap ko Allah hakeem wa Aleem ki taraf se Qur’aan sikhaya ja raha hai

(yaad hoga) jab ke Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne apne ghar waalo se kaha ke main ne aag dekhi hai, main wahaa se ya to koyi qabar le kar, ya aag ka koyi sulagta hoa angaara le kar abhi tumhaare paas aa jaonga, ta ke tum sek taap karlo
jab wahaa phaonche to awaaz di gayi ke ba-barkath hai wo jo is aag mein hai aur barkath diya gaya hai, wo jo us ke aas paas hai, aur paak hai Allah jo tamaam jahaano ka paalne waala hai
Mosa!(alaihissalaam) sun, baath ye hai ke main hee Allah hoon ghaalib ba hikmath

tu apni laathi daal de, Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne jab ose haltha-jhulta dekha, is tarah ke goya wo ek saanp hai, to mu mode hoye, peet pher kar bhaage aur palat kar bhi na dekha, aye Mosa!(alaihissalaam) khauf na kha, mere huzoor mein paighambar dara nahi karte
lekin jo log zulm kare, phir us ke ewaz neki kare, us buraayi ke piche to main bhi baqshne wala meherbaan hoon
aur apna haath apne girebaan mein daal, wo safedh chamkila ho kar niklega, baghair kisi ayb ke, tu nau(9) nishaaniya le kar feraun aur us ki khaum ki taraf ja, yaqinan wo badh-kaaro ka gruh hai
pas jab un ke paas aankhe khol dene waale hamaare maujeze pahonche to wo kehne lage, ye to sarih jaadu hai
unhone inkaar kar diya, halaan ke un ke dil yaqeen kar chuke thein, sirf zulm wa takabbaur ki bina par, pas dekh lijiye ke in fitna pardaaz logo ka anjaam kaisa kuch hoa

aur hum ne yaqinan Dawood(alaihissalaams) aur Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ko ilm de rakha tha, aur duno ne kaha tareef us Allah ke liye hai, jis ne hamein apne bahuth se imaandaar bando par fazilath ata farmaayi hai
aur Dawood(alaihissalaam) ke waaris sulaimaan hoye aur kehne lage logo! hamein parindo ki boli sikhaayi gayi hai aur hum sab kuch mein se diye gaye hai, beshak ye bilkul khula hoa fazle ilaahi hai
Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ke saamne unke tamaam lashkar jinnaath aur insaan aur parindh mein se jama kiye gaye (har har qism ki) alag alag darja bandhi kardi gayi
jab wo chontiyo ke maidaan mein pahonche to, ek chonti ne kaha, aye chontiyo! apne apne gharo mein ghus jaao, aisa na ho ke be-qabri mein sulaimaan aur us ka lashkar tumhe raundh daale

us ki is baath se hazrath Sulaiman(alaihissalaam) muskura kar has diye aur dua karne lage aye parvardigaar! tu mujhe taufeeq de ke main teri un nemato ka shukr baja laao jo tu ne mujh par in’aam ki hai aur mere maa baap par aur main aise nek amaal karta raho, jin se tu khush rahe, mujhe apni rehmath se nek bandho mein shaamil karle
aap ne parindo ka jayeza liya, aur farmaane lage, ye kya baath hai ke main hodh hodh ko nahi dekhta? kya waaqeyi wo ghair haazir hai
yaqinan main ose saqt saza dunga ya ose zubaah kar daalonga, ya mere saamne koyi sarih daleel bayaan kare
kuch zyaada der na guzri thi ke aakar us ne kaha main ek aisi cheez ki qabar laya hoon, ke tujhe us ki qabar hee nahi, main sabah ki ek sacchi qabar tere paas laya hoon
main ne dekha ke un ki badshaahath ek aurath kar rahi hai, jise har qism ki cheez se kuch na kuch diya gaya hai aur us ka taqth bhi badi azmath wala hai

main ne ose aur us ki khaum ko Allah ta’ala ko chohd kar suraj ko sajda karte hoye paaya, shaitaan ne un ke kaam unhe bhale kar ke dikhla kar sahih raah se rok diya hai, pas wo hidaayath par nahi aate
ke osi Allah ke liye sajde kare jo asmaano aur zamino ki pushida chizo ko baaher nikaalta hai aur jo kuch tum chupaate ho aur zaaher karte ho, wo sab kuch jaanta hai
us ke siva koyi mabude barhaq nahi, wahi azmath waale arsh ka maalik hai
Sulaiman ne kaha, ab hum dekhenge ke tu ne sach kaha hai ya tu jhuta hai
mere is qath ko le ja kar unhe de de, phir un ke paas se hat aa, aur dekh ke wo kya jawaab dete hai
wo kehne lagi, aye sardaaro! meri taraf ek ba-waq’ath qath daala gaya hai
jo Sulaimaan ki taraf se hai aur jo baqshish karne waale meherbaan Allah ke naam se shuro hai
ye ke tum mere saamne sarkashi na karo aur musalmaan ban kar mere paas aa jaao
us ne kaha aye mere sardaaro! tum mere is maamle mein mujhe mashwera do, main kisi amr ka qatayi faisla jab tak tumhaari maujodgi aur raay na ho, nahi kiya karti
un sab ne jawaab diya ke hum taaqath aur quwwath waale aur saqt ladne aur bhidne waale hai, aage aap ko eqtiyaar hai, aap khud hee sonch li jiye ke hamein aap kya kuch hukm farmaati hai
us ne kaha badshaah jab kisi basti mein ghuste hai to ose ujaad dete hai aur wahaa ke ba-izzath logo ko zaleel kar dete hai aur ye log bhi aisa hee karenge
main unhe ek hadhya bhejne wali hoon, phir dekh longi ke qaasidh kya jawaab le kar laut te hai

pas jab qaasidh (hazrath) Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ke paas pahoncha, to aap ne farmaya kya tum maal se mujhe madad dena chahte ho? mujhe to mere rab ne is se bahuth behtar de rakha hai, jo us ne tumhe diya hai, pas tum hee apne tuhfe se khush raho
ja un ki taraf waapas laut ja, hum un (ke muqaable) par wo lashkar layenge, jin ke saamne padne ki un mein taaqath nahi aur hum unhe zaleel wa pasth kar ke wahaa se nikaal baahar karenge
aap ne farmaya, aye sardaro tum mein se koyi hai jo un ke musalmaan ho kar pahonchne se pehle hee us ka taqth mujhe la de
ek qawi haykal jin kehne laga, aap apni is majlis se uthe, us se pehle hee pehle main ose aap ke paas la deta hoon, yaqeen maniye ke main us par qaadir hoon aur hoon bhi amaanatdaar

jis ke paas kitaab ka ilm tha wo bol utha ke aap palak jhapkaaye, us se bhi pehle main ose aap ke paas pahoncha sakta hoon, jab aap se ose apne paas maujoodh paya to farmaane lage ke yahi mere rab ka fazl hai, ta ke wo mujhe azmaaye ke main shukr guzaari karta hoon ya na shukri, shukr guzaar apne hee na’fe ke liye shukr guzaari karta hai aur jo na shukri kare to wo mera parvardigaar (be parvaah aur buzrug) ghani aur kareem hai
hukm diya ke us ke taqth mein kuch pher badal kar do, ta ke maloom ho jaaye ke ye raah paaleti hai ya un mein se hoti hai jo raah nahi paate
phir jab wo aa gayi to us se kaha (daryaaft kiya) gaya ke aisa hee tera (bhi) taqth hai? us ne jawaab diya ke ye goya wahi hai, hamein is se pehle hee ilm diya gaya tha aur hum musalmaan thein
ose unhone rok rakha tha jin ki wo Allah ke siva parastish karti rahi thi, yaqinan wo kaafir logo mein se thi

us se kaha gaya ke mahal mein chali chalo, jise dekha ke ye samajh kar ke ye hauz hai, us ne apni pindliya khol di, farmaya ye to sheeshe se mondhi hoyi imaarath hai, kehne lagi mere parvardigaar! main ne apne aap par zulm kiya, ab main Sulaimaan(alaihissalaam) ke saath Allah rabbul aalameen ki muti aur farma bardaar banti hoon
yaqinan hum ne samoodh ki taraf un ke bhai saaleh ko bheja ke tum sab Allah ki ibaadath karo, phir bhi wo do fareeq ban kar aapas mein ladne jhagadne lage
aap ne farmaya aye meri khaum ke logo! tum neki se pehle buraayi ki jaldi kyo macha rahe ho? tum Allah ta’ala se isteghfaar kyo nahi karte ta ke tum par rahem kiya jaaye
wo kehne lage hum to teri aur tere saathiyo ki badh shuguni le rahe hai? aap ne farmaya tumhaari badh shuguni Allah ke haan hai, balke tum fitne mein pade hoye log ho
us shahar mein nau sardaar thein, jo zameen mein fasaadh pehlaate rehte thein aur islaah nahi karte thein

unhone aapas mein badi qasme kha kha kar ahad kiya ke raath hee ko saaleh aur us ke ghar waalo par hum chaapa marenge aur us ke waariso se saaf keh denge ke hum us ke ahal ki halaakath ke waqth maujoodh na thein aur hum bilkul sacche hai
unhone makar (khufiyaa tadbeer) kiya aur hum ne bhi, aur wo ose samajhte hee na thein
(ab) dekh le un ke makar ka anjaam kaisa kuch hoa? ke hum ne un ko aur un ki khaum ko sab ko ghaarath kar diya
ye hai un ke makanaath jo un ke zulm ki wajeh se ujde pade hai, jo log ilm rakhte hai un ke liye is mein badi nishaani hai
hum ne un ko jo imaan laaye thein aur parhezgaar thein, baal baal bacha liya
aur Looth ka (zikr kar) jab ke us ne apni khaum se kaha ke kya ba wajoodh dekhne bhaalne ke phir bhi tum badh kaari kar rahe ho
ye kya baath hai ke tum aurto ko chohd kar mardo ke paas shehwath se aate ho? haq ye hai ke tum badi hee na daani kar rahe ho
khaum ka jawaab bajuz us kehne ke aur kuch na tha ke aale looth ko apne shahar se shahar badar kardo, ye to bade paak baaz ban rahe hai
pas hum ne ose aur us ke ahal ko bajuz us ki biwi ke sab ko bacha liya, us ka andaza to baaqi reh jaane waalo mein, hum laga hee chuke thein
aur un par ek qaas (qism ki) baarish barsa di, pas un dhamkaaye hoye logo par buri baarish hoyi
tu kehde ke tamaam tareef Allah hee ke liye hai aur us ke bar-guzida bandho par salaam hai, kya Allah ta’ala behtar hai ya wo jinhe ye log shareek tehra rahe hai

bhala bataao to? ke asmaano aur zameen ko kis ne paida kiya? kis ne asmaan se baarish barsaayi? phir us se hare bhare ba-raunaq baghaath uga diye? un baagho ke daraqto ko tum hargiz na uga sakte, kya Allah ke saath aur koyi maboodh bhi hai? balke ye log hat jaate hai (sidhi raah se)

kya wo jis ne zameen ko qaraar gaah banaya aur us ke darmiyaan nehre jaari kardi aur us ke liye pahaad banaaye aur do samandaro ke darmiyaan rok bana di, kya Allah ke saath aur koyi maboodh bhi hai? balke un mein se aksar kuch jaante hee nahi

bekas ki pukaar ko jab ke wo pukaare, kaun qubool kar ke saqti ko door kar deta hai? aur tumhe zameen ka qalifa banata hai, kya Allah ta’ala ke saath aur maboodh hai? tum bahuth kam nasihath wa ibrath haasil karte ho

kya wo jo tumhe khushki aur tari ki tarikiyo mein raah dikhata hai aur jo apni rehmath se pehle hee khush qabriya dene waali hawaaye chalata hai, kya Allah ke saath koyi aur maboodh bhi hai, jinhe ye shareek karte hai, un sab se Allah bulandh wa baalatar hai

kya wo jo maqlooq ki awwal dafa paidayish karta hai, phir ose lautayega aur jo tumhe asmaan aur zameen se roziya de raha hai, kya Allah ke saath koyi aur maboodh hai, keh dijiye ke agar sacche ho to apni daleel laao
keh dijiye ke asmaano walo mein se zameen waalo mein se sivaaye Allah ke koyi ghayb nahi jaanta, unhe to ye bhi nahi maloom ke kabh utha khade kiye jayenge
balke aaqirath ke baare mein un ka ilm qatam ho chuka hai, balke ye us ki taraf se shak mein hai balke ye us se andhe hai
kaafiro ne kaha ke kya jab hum mitthi ho jayenge aur hamaare baap dada bhi, kya hum phir nikaale jayenge
hum aur hamaare baap dadaao ko bahuth pehle se ye waade kiye jaate rahe, kuch nahi ye to sirf aglo ke afsaane hai
keh dijiye ke zameen mein chal phir kar zara dekho to sahih, ke gunehgaaro ka kaisa anjaam hoa
aap un ke baare mein gham na kare aur un ke daao ghaath se tang dil na ho
kehte hai ke ye waada kabh hai, agar sacche ho to bathla do
jawaab di jiye! ke shaayad baaz wo cheeze jin ki tum jaldi macha rahe ho, tum se bahuth hee qareeb ho gayi ho
yaqinan aap ka parvardigaar tamaam logo par bade hee fazl wala hai, lekin aksar log na shukri karte hai
beshak aap ka rab un chizo ko bhi jaanta hai, jinhe un ke sine chupa rahe hai aur jinhe zaaher kar rahe hai
asmaan wa zameen ki koyi pushida cheez bhi aisi nahi jo roushan aur khuli kitaab mein na ho
yaqinan Qur’aan bani israel ke saamne un aksar chizo ka bayaan kar raha hai, jin mein ye eqtelaaf karte hai
aur ye Qur’aan imaan waalo ke liye yaqinan hidaayath aur rehmath hai
aap ka rab un ke darmiyaan apne hukm se sab faisle kar dega, wo bada hee ghaalib aur daana hai
pas aap yaqinan Allah hee par bharosa rakhiye, yaqinan aap sacche aur khule deen par hai
beshak aap na murdo ko suna sakte hai aur na behro ko apni pukaar suna sakte hai jab ke wo peet phere ru garda ja rahe ho
aur na aap andho ko un ki gumraahi se hata kar rehnumaayi kar sakte hai, aap to sirf unhe suna sakte hai jo hamaari aayato par imaan laaye hai, phir wo farma bardaar ho jaate hai
jab un ke upar azaab ka waada saabith ho jayega, hum zameen se un ke liye ek jaanwar nikaalenge jo un se baatien karta hoga, ke log hamaari aayato par yaqeen nahi karte thein
aur jis din hum har ummath mein se un logo ke gruh ko jo hamaari aayato ko jhutlaate thein, gher ghaar kar layenge, phir wo sab ke sab alag kar diye jayenge
jab sab ke sab aa pahonchenge, to Allah ta’ala farmaayega ke tum ne meri aayato ko ba-wajoodh ye ke tumhe un ka pura ilm na tha, kyo jhutlaya? aur ye bhi batlaao ke tum kya kuch karte rahe
ba-sabab us ke, ke unhone zulm kiya tha, un par baath jam jayegi aur wo kuch bol na sakenge

kya wo dekh nahi rahe hai ke hum ne raath ko is liye banaya hai ke wo us mein araam haasil karle aur din ko hum ne dikh laane wala banaya hai, yaqinan us mein un logo ke liye nishaaniya hai jo imaan wa yaqeen rakhte hai
jis din soor phonka jayega, to sab ke sab asmaano waale aur zameen waale ghabra uthenge magar jise Allah ta’ala chaahe aur saare ke saare aajiz wa pasth ho kar us ke saamne haazir honge

aur aap pahaado ko dekh kar apni jageh jame hoye qayaal karte hai, lekin wo bhi baadal ki tarah udte phirenge, ye hai sanadh Allah ki, jis ne har cheez ko mazbooth banaya hai, jo kuch tum karte ho us se wo ba-qabar hai
jo log nek amal layenge, unhe us se behtar badhla milega aur wo us din ki ghabraahat se be khauf honge
aur jo buraayi le kar ayenge, wo aundhe mu aag mein jhonk diye jayenge, sirf wahi badhla diye jaoge, jo tum karte rahe

mujhe to bas yahi hukm diya gaya hai ke main is shahar ke parvardigaar ki ibaadath karta raho, jis ne ose hurmath wala banaya hai, jis ki milkiyath har cheez hai aur mujhe ye bhi farmaya gaya hai ke main farma-bardaaro mein ho jaao

aur main Qur’aan ki tilaawath karta raho, jo raahe raasth par aa jaaye wo apne na’fe ke liye raahe raasth par ayega aur jo bahek jaaye to keh dijiye! ke main to sirf hoshiyaar karne waalo mein se hoon
keh dijiye ke tamaam tareefe Allah hee ko saza waar hai, wo an-qareeb apni nishaaniya dikhayega, jinhe tum (khud) pehchaan loge aur jo kuch tum karte ho, us se aap ka rab ghaafil nahi

ye aayate hai roushan kitaab ki
hum aap ke saamne Mosa(alaihissalaam) aur feraun ka sahih waaqea bayaan karte hai un logo ke liye jo imaan rakhte hai

yaqinan feraun ne zameen mein sarkashi kar rakhi thi aur wahaan ke logo ko gruh gruh bana rakha tha aur un mein se ek firqe ko kamzoor kar rakha tha, aur un ke ladko ko to zubaah kar daalta tha aur un ki ladkiyo ko zinda chohd deta tha, beshak wa shuba wo tha hee mufsido mein se
phir hamaari chaahath hoyi ke hum un par karam farmaaye jinhe zameen mein be-hadh kamzoor kar diya gaya tha aur hum unhee ko peshwa aur (zameen) ka waaris banaaye
aur ye bhi ke hum unhe zameen mein khudrath wa eqtiyaar de aur feraun aur hamaan aur un ke lashkaro ko wo dikhaaye jis se wo dar rahe hai

hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) ki maa ko wahi ki ke ise doodh pilaati reh, aur jab tujhe us ki nisbath koyi khauf maloom ho to, ose darya mein baha dena aur koyi dar khauf ya ranj gham na karna, hum yaqinan ose teri taraf lautaane waale hai aur ose apne paighambaro mein banaane waale hai
aaqir feraun ke logo ne us bacche ko utha liya, ke aaqir kaar yahi baccha un ka dushman hoa aur un ke ranj ka baayes bana, kuch shak nahi ke feraun aur hamaan aur un ke lashkar thein hee qata-kaar

aur feraun ki biwi ne kaha, ye to meri aur teri aankho ki thandak hai, ise qatl na karo, bahuth mumkin hai ke ye hamein koyi fayeda pahonchaaye ya hum ose apna hee beta bana le aur ye log sha-oor hee na rakhte thein
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ki waalida ka dil be qaraar ho gaya, qareeb thi ke is waaqe ko bilkul zaaher kar deti agar hum in ke dil ko dhaaras1 na dete, is liye ke wo yaqeen karne waalo mei rahe
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ki waleda ne us ki behen se kaha ke tu us ke piche piche ja, to wo ose door hee door se dekhti rahi aur ferauniyo ko us ka ilm bhi na hoa

un ke pahonchne se pehle hum ne Mosa(alaihissalaam) par daaiyo ka doodh haraam kar diya tha, ye kehne lagi ke kya main tumhe aisa gharaana bataao, jo is bacche ki tumhaare liye parvarish kare aur ho bhi wo is bacche ke khair qaah
bas hum ne ose us ki maa ki taraf waapas pahonchaya, ta ke us ki aankhe thandi rahe aur aazurda qaatir2 na ho aur jaan le ke Allah ta’ala ka waada saccha hai, lekin aksar log nahi jaante
aur jab Mosa(alaihissalaam) apni jawaani ko pahonch gaye aur pure tawaana ho gaye, hum ne unhe hikmath wa ilm ata farmaya, neki karne walo ko hum isi tarah badhla diya karte hai

aur Mosa(alaihissalaam) ek aise waqt shahar mein aaye jab ke shahar ke log ghaflath mein thein, yaha do shaqso ko ladte hoye paaya, ye ek to us ke rafiqo mein se tha aur ye dosra us ke dushmano mein se, us ki khaum waale ne us ke qilaaf jo us ke dushmano mein se tha, us se faryaad ki, jis par Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne us ko mukka maara, jis se wo mar gaya, Mosa(alaihissalaam) kehne lage ye to shaitaani kaam hai, yaqinan shaitaan dushman aur khule taur par behkaane wala hai
phir dua karne lage ke aye parvardigaar! main ne khud apne upar zulm kiya, tu mujhe maaf farma de, Allah ta’ala ne ose baqsh diya, wo baqshish aur bahuth meherbaani karne wala hai
kehne lage aye mere rab! jaise tu ne mujh par ye karam farmaaya, main bhi ab har giz kisi gunehgaar ka madadgaar na banonga

subah hee subah darte, andeshe ki haalath mein qabre lene ko shahar mein gaye, ke achaanak wahi shaqs jis ne kal un se madad talab ki thi, un se faryaad kar raha hai, Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne us se kaha ke, is mein shak nahi, tu to sarih be raah hai

phir jab apne aur us ke dushman ko pakadna chaaha, wo faryaadi kehne laga, Mosa(alaihissalaam) kya jis tarah tu ne kal ek shaqs ko qatal kiya hai, mujhe bhi maar daalna chahta hai, tu to mulk mein zaalim wa sarkash hona hee chahta hai aur tera ye iraada hee nahi ke milaap karne waalo mein se ho

shahar ke parle kinaare se ek shaqs daudta hoa aaya, aur kehne laga aye Mosa!(alaihissalaam) yahaan ke sardaar tere qatl ka mashwera kar rahe hai, pas tu bahuth jald chala ja,mujhe apna qair qwah maan
pas Mosa(alaihissalaam) wahaan se khauf zada ho kar dekhte bhaalte nikal khade hoye, kehne lage aye parvardigaar! mujhe zaalimo ke gruh se bacha le
aur jab madyan ki taraf mutawajjeh hoye, to kehne lage mujhe ummid hai ke mera rab mujhe sidhi raah le chalega

madyan ke paani par jab aap pahonche, to dekha ke logo ki ek jamaath wahaan paani pila rahi hai aur do aurte alag khadi apne (jaanwaro ko) rokti hoyi dikhaayi di, pucha ke tumhara kya haal hai, wo boli ke jab tak ye charwaahe waapas na jaaye, hum paani nahi pilaati aur hamaare waalid bahuth badi umr ke budhe hai
pas aap ne khud un jaanwaro ko paani pila diya, phir saaye ki taraf hat aaye aur kehne lage aye parvardigaar! tu jo kuch bhalaayi meri taraf utaare, main us ka muhtaaj hoon

itne mein un duno aurto mein se ek un ki taraf sharm wa haya se chalti hoyi aayi, kehne lagi ke mere baap aap ko bula rahe hai, ta ke aap ne hamaare (jaanwaro) ko jo paani pilaya hai, us ki ujrath de, jab hazrath Mosa(alaihissalaam) un ke paas pahonche aur un se apna saara haal bayaan kiya, to wo kehne lage, ab na dar, tu ne zaalim khaum se najaath paayi
un duno mein se ek ne kaha ke abba ji! aap unhe mazdoori par rakh li jiye kyo ke jinhe aap ujrath par rakhe, un mein se sab se behtar wo hai jo mazbooth aur amaanatdaar ho

us buzrug ne kaha main apni in duno ladkiyo mein se ek ko aap ke nikaah mein dena chahta hoon, is (meher par) ke aap aat (8)saal tak mera kaam kaaj kare, haan agar aap das saal pure kare to ye aap ki taraf se bataur ehsaan ke hain, main ye hargiz nahi chahta ke ap ko kisi mashaqqath mein daalo, Allah ko manzoor hai to aage chal kar aap mujhe bhala aadmi payenge

Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha khair to ye baath mere aur aap ke darmiyaan puqta ho gayi, main in duno muddato mein se jise pura karo, mujh par koyi zyaadati na ho, hum ye jo kuch keh rahe hai, us par Allah gawaah aur kaar saaz hai

jab hazrath Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne muddath puri karli aur apne ghar waalo ko le kar chale, to ko-he toor ki taraf aag dekhi, apni biwi se kehne lage tehro! main ne aag dekhi hai, bahuth mumkin hai ke main wahaa se koyi qabar laao ya aag ka koyi angaara laao, ta ke tum sek lo
pas jab wahaan pahonche to us ba barkath zameen ke maidaan ke daay kinaare ke daraqth mein se awaaz diye gaye, ke aye Mosa(alaihissalaam) yaqinan main hee Allah hoon, saare jahaano ka parvardigaar

aur ye (bhi awaaz aayi) ke apni laathi daal de, phir jab ose dekha ke wo saanp ki tarah phan phana rahi hai, to peet pher kar waapas ho gaye aur mud kar rukh bhi na kiya, hum ne kaha aye Mosa! (alaihissalaam) aage aa, dar math, yaqinan tu har tarah amn waala hai

apne haath ko apne girebaan mein daal, wo baghair kisi qism ke roog ke chamakta hoa niklega, bilkul safedh aur khauf se (bachne ke liye) apne baazu apni taraf mila le, pas ye duno maujeze tere liye tere rab ki taraf se hai, feraun aur us ki jamaath ki taraf, yaqinan wo sab ke sab be-hukm aur na farmaan log hai
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ne kaha parvardigaar! main ne in ka ek aadmi qatl kar diya tha, ab mujhe andesha hai ke wo mujhe bhi qatl kar daale

aur mera bhai Haroon(alaihissalaam) mujh se bahuth zyaada fasih zabaan wala hai, tu ose bhi mera madadgaar bana kar mere saath bhej, ke wo mujhe saccha maane, mujhe to khauf hai ke wo sab mujhe jhutla denge

Allah ta’ala ne farmaya ke hum tere bhai ke saath tere baazu mazbooth kar denge aur tum duno ko ghalba denge, ferauni tum tak pahonch hee na sakenge, ba-sabab hamaari nishaaniyo ke, tum duno aur tumhaari taabedaari karne waale hee ghaalib rahenge

pas jab un ke paas Mosa(alaihissalaam) hamaare diye hoye khule maujeze le kar pahonche to kehne lage ye to sirf ghada ghadaaya jaadu hai, hum ne apne agle baap dadaao ke zamaane mein kabhi ye nahi suna

hazrath Mosa(alaihissalaam) kehne lage mera rab ta’ala ose qoob jaanta hai jo us ke paas ki hidaayath le kar aata hai aur jis ke liye aaqirath ka (accha) anjaam hota hai, yaqinan be insaafo ka bhala na hoga

feraun kehne laga aye darbaariyo, main to apne siva kisi ko tumhara maboodh nahi jaanta, sun aaye hamaan! tu mere liye mitthi ko aag se pakwa, phir mere liye ek mahal taameer kar, to main Mosa(alaihissalaam) ke maboodh ko jhaank lo, ise main to jhuto mein se hee gumaan kar raha hoon
us ne aur us ke lashkaro ne na haq tariqe par mulk mein takabbur kiya aur samajh liya ke wo hamaari jaanib lautaaye hee na jayenge
bil aaqir hum ne ose aur us ke lashkaro ko pakad liya aur darya burdh3 kar diya, ab dekh le ke un gunehgaaro ka anjaam kaisa kuch hoa

aur tumhaare gharo mein Allah ki jo aayate aur rasool(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) ki jo ahaadees padhi jaati hai, un ka zikr karti raho, yaqinan Allah ta’ala luthf karne waala qabardaar hai

un mein se jise tu chaahe door rakh de aur jise chaahe apne paas rakh le aur agar tu un mein se bhi kisi ko apne paas bulaale, jinhe tu ne alag kar rakha tha, to tujh par koyi gunaah nahi, us mein is baath ki zyaada tawaqqo hai ke, un aurto ki aankhe thandi rahe aur wo ranjida na ho, aur jo kuch bhi tu unhe de de, us par sab ki sab raazi rahe, tumhaare dilo mein jo kuch hai, ose Allah (qoob) jaanta hai, Allah ta’ala bada hee ilm aur hilm waala hai

un par phitkaar barsaayi gayi, jahaan bhi mil jaaye pakde jaaye aur qoob tukde tukde kar diye jaye

us ke baadh hum ne us ki khaum par asmaan se koyi lashkar na utaara aur na is tarah hum utaara karte hai
wo to sirf ek zoor ki cheeq thi, ke yeka yek wo sab ke sab bujh buja gaye
(aise) bandho par afsoos! kabi bhi koyi rasool un par nahi aaya, jis ki hasi unhone na udaayi ho
kya unhone nahi dekha ke un ke pehle bahuth si khaumo ko hum ne ghaarath kar diya, ke wo un ki taraf laut kar nahi ayenge
aur nahi hai koyi jamaath, magar ye ke jama ho kar hamaare saamne haazir ki jayegi
aur un ke liye ek nishaani (khushk) zameen hai jis ko hum ne zinda kar diya aur us se ghalla nikala, jis mein se wo khaate hai
aur hum ne us mein khajuro ke aur angoor ke baghaath paida kar diye aur jin mein hum ne chashme bhi jaari kar diye hai
ta ke (log) us ke phal khaaye aur us ko un ke haatho ne nahi banaya, phir kyo shukr guzaari nahi karte
wo paak zaath hai jis ne har cheez ke jode paida kiye, qaah wo zameen ki ugaayi hoyi cheeze ho, qaah khud un ke nafoos ho, qaah wo (cheeze) ho, jinhe ye jaante bhi nahi
aur un ke liye ek nishaani raath hai, jis se hum din ko kheench dete hai to wo yeka yek andhere mein reh jaate hai
aur suraj ke liye jo muqarrara raah hai wo osi par chalta rehta hai, ye hai muqarrar karda ghaalib, ba ilm Allah ta’ala ka
aur chaandh ki hum ne manzile muqarrar kar rakhi hai, yahaan tak ke wo laut kar puraani tehni ki tarah ho jaata hai
na aftaab ki ye majaal hai ke chaandh ko pakde aur na raath din par aage bad jaane waali hai, aur sab ke sab asmaan mein tayr te phirte hai
aur un ke liye ek nishaani (ye bhi) hai ke hum ne un ki nasl ko bhari hoyi kashti mein sawaar kiya
aur un ke liye isi jaisi aur cheeze paida ki, jin par ye sawaar hote hai
aur agar hum chaahte, to inhe dubo dete, phir na to koyi un ka faryaadh ras hota, na wo bachaaye jaaye
lekin hum apni taraf se rahmath karte hai aur ek muddath tak ke liye unhe fayde de rahe hai
aur un se jab (kabhi) kaha jaata hai ke agle pichle gunaaho (se bacho) ta ke tum par rahem kiya jaaye
aur un ke paas to un ke rab ki nishaaniyo mein se koyi nishaani aisi nahi aati, jis se ye be-roqi na baratte ho

aur un se jab kaha jaata hai ke Allah ta’ala ke diye hoye mein se kuch qarch karo, to ye kuffaar imaan waalo ko jawaab dete hai ke hum inhe kyo khilaaye? jinhe agar Allah ta’ala chaahta to khud khila pila deta, tum to ho hee khuli gumraahi mein
wo kehte hai ke ye waada kab hoga, sacche ho to batlaao
unhe sirf ek saqt cheeq ka intezaar hai, jo unhe aa pakdegi aur ye baaham ladaayi jahgde mein hee honge
us waqt na to ye wasiyath kar sakenge aur na apne ahal ki taraf laut sakenge
to soor ke phuke jaate hee, sab ke sab apni qabro se apne parvardigaar ki taraf (tez tez) chalne lagenge
kahenge ke haay haay! hamein hamaari qaab gaaho se kis ne utha diya, yahi hai jis ka waada rahmaan ne diya tha aur rasulo ne sach sach keh diya tha
ye nahi hai magar ek cheeq, ke yeka yek saare ke saare hamaare saamne haazir kar diye jayenge
pas aaj kisi shaqs par kuch bhi zulm na kiya jayega aur tumhe nahi badhla diya jayega magar sirf unhee kaamo ka jo tum kiya karte thein
jannati log aaj ke din apne (dil chasp) mashghalo mein hashaash bashaash hai
wo aur un ki biwiya saayo mein maseriyo par takiya lagaaye baithe honge
un ke liye jannath mein har qism ke mewe honge aur bhi jo kuch wo talab kare
meherbaan parvardigaar ki taraf se unhe salaam kaha jayega
aye gunehgaaro! aaj tum alag ho jaao
aye aulaade aadam! kya main ne tum se khaul qaraar nahi liya tha, ke tum shaytaan ki ibaadath na karna, wo tumhaara khula dushman hai
aur meri hee ibaadath karna, sidhi raah yahi hai
shaytaan ne to tum mein se bahuth saari maqlooq ko beh ka diya, kya tum aqal nahi rakhte
yahi wo dozakh hai jis ka tumhe waada diya jaata tha
apne kufr ka badhla paane ke liye aaj us mein daakhil ho jaao
hum aaj ke din un ke mu par muhre laga denge aur un ke haath hum se baatein karenge aur un ke paau gawaahiya denge, un kaamo ki jo wo karte thein
agar hum chaahte, to un ki aankhe be noor kar dete, phir ye raste ki taraf daudte phirte, lekin inhe kaise dikhaayi deta
aur agar hum chaahte to un ki jageh hee par un ki surte masq1 kar dete, phir na wo chal phir sakte aur na laut sakte
aur jise hum buda karte hai, ose paydayishi haalath ki taraf phir ulat dete hai, kya phir bhi nahi samajhte
na to hum ne is paighambar ko sher sikhaaye aur na ye is ke laayeq hai, wo to sirf nasihath aur waazeh Qur’aan hai
ta ke wo har us shaqs ko aagah kar de, jo zinda hai aur kaafiro par hujjath saabith ho jaaye
kya wo nahi dekhte ke hum ne apne haatho banaayi hoyi chizo mein se un ke liye chau paaye(bhi) paida kar diye, jin ke ye maalik ho gaye hai
aur un maweshiyo ko hum ne un ka taabe farmaan bana diya hai, jin mein se baaz to un ki sawariyaa hai aur baaz ka gosht khaate hai
unhe un se aur bhi bahuth se fayde hai aur pine ki cheeze, kya phir (bhi) ye shukr adaa nahi karenge
aur wo Allah ke siva dosro ko maboodh banaate hai, ta ke wo madad kiye jaaye
(halaan ke) un mein un ki madad ki taaqath hee nahi (lekin) phir bhi (mushrikeen) un ke liye haazir baash lashkari hai
pas aap ko un ki baath ghamnaak na kare, hum un ki pushida aur elaaniya sab baatho ko (ba qoobi) jaante hai
kya insaan ko itna bhi maloom nahi ke hum ne ose nutfe se paida kiya hai? phir yeka yek wo sarih jhagdaalo ban baitha
aur us ne hamaare liye misaal bayaan ki aur apni (asal) paydaayish ko bhool gaya, kehne laga in gali sadi haddiyo ko kaun zinda kar sakta hai
aap jawaab di jiye ke unhe wo zinda karega, jis ne unhe awwal martaba paida kiya hai, jo sab tarah ki paydayish ka ba-qoobi jaanne waala hai
wahi jis ne tumhaare liye sabz daraqt se aag paida kardi, jis se tum yeka yek aag sulgaate ho
jis ne asmaano aur zameen ko paida kiya hai, kya wo un jaiso ke paida karne par qaadir nahi, beshak qaadir hai aur wahi to paida karne waala daana aur (bina) hai
wo jab kabhi kisi cheez ka iraada karta hai, ose itna farma dena (kaafi hai) ke ho ja, wo osi waqt ho jaati hai
pas paak hai wo Allah jis ke haath mein har cheez ki badshaahath hai aur jis ke taraf tum sab lautaaye jaoge
